name: Shadow Lands
description:
A dark game about a shade looking for salvation. Which you of course achieve by sacrificing "friends" because some voice tells you to do so.

Controls:

Jump: Space/Gamepad Bottom Button (A Button on XBox Gamepad)

Move: Arrow Keys/WASD/Left Control Stick

Collect/Sacrifice/Throw Friends: E/Right Gamepad Button

You need to collect three keys. Advance through the level by gathering "friends" and sacrificing them in front of altars or throwing them into spikes or unto enemies.

Created for Ludum Dare 43.

Team:

Johannes Alef: Programming

Hagen Becker: Programming

Maria Rumjanzewa: Music

Rebecca Schieren: Art, Programming

Hong Linh Thai: Music, Programming

Technology:  Unity, Krita, Gimp, Ableton Live, Audacity
